title: Content Management System for Country Club Website
description:
I designed this mobile-responsive website for a country club. There is a content management system for this website so that the site owners can easily update the content on the website without needing to fiddle with the website coding.

Some of the customised features of this website is the class scheduler and the embedding of google virtual tour.

items.description: Hovering over the main menu reveals the sub-menu with an introductory image to the page that it is linked to.
Slider for banners of upcoming events.
